summary: All three requirements are implemented. REQ-10 is addressed in HomePage.tsx with 'Bhupesh Chaudhary' as the primary heading and 'IAS Officer Â· Ladakh' as the subtitle. REQ-11 is addressed in Navigation.tsx (brand/logo), Footer.tsx (copyright/tagline), and ResumePage.tsx (page title and subtitle). REQ-12 is addressed via the migration module (backend/migration.mo) which seeds the resume with a professional summary for Bhupesh Chaudhary in stable state, and main.mo applies the migration.

hallucinated_features.description: A dedicated migration module file (backend/migration.mo) was introduced as a separate file
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request constraint states 'Keep all Motoko logic within the single main actor file.' The migration logic is placed in a separate module file rather than being kept within main.mo.
